item.description: Tim and Tom discuss what a crazy year 2018 was for professional wrestling by recapping the major news stories, story-lines, and characters.

item.description: Tim and Tom each have 3 wrestling wishes for Santa, as they sit on his lap and discuss the latest week of professional wrestling.

item.description: Tim and Tom give you their in-depth picks for the upcoming TLC pay-per-view, as well as discuss RAW and Smackdown.

item.description: Tim and Tom are excited for Thanksgiving, so they tell you what they are thankful for in wrestling this year. They also discuss WWE Survivor Series, NXT Takeover: War Games II, RAW, Smackdown Live, Impact Wrestling and a whole bunch of other stuff you don't want to miss.

item.description: Tim and Tom discuss NXT Takeover: War Games II, WWE Survivor Series, RAW, Smackdown Live, Becky Lynch's white-hot run, and so much more in this fun episode.

item.description: Tim and Tom dig into Crown Jewel, RAW, Smackdown Live, the latest pro-wrestling news, and more.

item.description: Tim and Tom discuss Evolution, Crown Jewel, Roman Reigns, Leukemia, your tweets, and so much more. They also spend some time honoring the late Iron Mike Sharpe!

item.title: Funniest Moments Vol. 6 - The Spanish Announce Table - Episode 232
item.description: A special episode of the Spanish Announce Table featuring some of the funniest moments from Episodes 126 - 150.

item.description: Tim and Tom go hard on The Super Duper Down Under Showtime Showdown, talk about some talent signing news, backwards calendars, stale cereal, and making out with pasty-white bald guys. Just a typical week on The Spanish Announce Table!

item.title: Thunder - The Spanish Announce Table - Episode 229
item.description: Tim and Tom discuss the fun week of professional wrestling and then make a case for Jushin Thunder Liger as being one of the greatest pro wrestlers of all time.

item.description: Tim and Tom discuss what they did and didn't like about Hell In A Cell, Raw, and Smackdown. They also talk about how impressive it is to jump over a Super Target.

item.description: Tim and Tom discuss All In, Raw, and Smackdown. They also have lengthy discussions on how great they thought the Miz and Daniel Bryan storyline is, and how much potential they see in the Drake Maverick and AOP storyline.

item.description: Tim and Tom discuss All In and the PWI Top 10. They also each list their own Top 10, and explain why they hate everyone equally!

item.description: Tim and Tom discuss SummerSlam, NXT, Raw, and Smackdown and really focus in on storylines; when they are done well, and when they are not done well.

item.title: SummerSlam 2018 - The Spanish Announce Table - Episode 223
item.description: Tim and Tom have returned to the world of wrestling and will now be bringing you The Spanish Announce Table each and every week! What better way to kick it off than with the same Pay Per View that they started with 5 years ago; SummerSlam! Not only do they give their thoughts and predictions for SummerSlam, but they also give discuss NXT Takeover Brooklyn, Titus O'Neil, Jim The Anvil Neidhart, and so much more in their triumphant return!

item.title: Man Date - Tim and Tom - Episode 36
item.description: Tim and Tom discuss everything under the sun, including their man date this past week.

item.description: Tim and Tom talk about U.S. imigration policy, Jerry Springer, World Cup beer drinkers, and much more. They also rewind the tapes to present the Best of Winter 2018!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are back for another 18 and over show as they present yet another edition of The Spanish Announce Table. Money in the Bank is this weekend and the Podcast Tag Team Champions are covering the card of both Money in the Bank and NXT Takeover.

item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Cindy McDermott and Nick Lopez about the Moral Injury Assocation of America and their writing seminars in Kansas City for veterans and their families. Tim and Tom also talk about the NBA Finals, Miss America, and WiFi toes!

item.description: Tim and Tom get heated about the NFL's new anthem policy, and they recap some great interviews from past weeks.

item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Darwin Pennye, Executive Director of the Kansas City Royals Urban Youth Academy and they learn about how the organization supports local youth by getting them involved in the sport of baseball.

item.description: Nick Jacobs of 41 Action News is back on the show to talk about the Kansas City Chiefs and give Tim and Tom his analysis of the team's 2018 NFL Draft picks!

item.title: The Spanish Announce Table - Episode 221 - The Greatest Royal Rumble
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are back for another 18 and over show as they present yet another edition of The Spanish Announce Table. The Greatest Royal Rumble is around the corner and the Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts weigh in on anything and everything they can think of surrounding the event. This one is not for the children, unless your children are awesome!

item.title: Headlines - Tim and Tom - Episode 26
item.description: Tim and Tom discuss the hottest headlines and weigh in with their opinions.

item.description: Mycroft AI CEO Josh Montgomery talks to Tim and Tom about a new way to look at smart home speakers. Tim and Tom also talk about Facebook, Congress, and many more topics in the latest episode of Tim and Tom!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac got in the same room at the same time to record a podcast! It's WrestleMania time and the guys have some opinions, naturally!

item.description: Ben Jackson of Bungii tells Tim and Tom about his crazy idea to create an on-demand large-item delivery service, that is now a fast-growing, nationally-expanding service that is changing the way people shop and live. Tim and Tom also talk about the Final Four, the Royals, the Schlitterbahn indictment and much more.

item.description: Cody Tapp of 810 WHB talks to Tim and Tom about March Madness and the local teams playing in it. Tim and Tom also talk about celebrity crushes, skating rinks, Stephen Hawking, and many more topics that you can't wait to hear!

item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Tim Sylvester of Integrated Roadways about the future of tech-infused roadways. Tim and Tom also share some fun stories about 2 year Anniversaries and a Man's Breakfast.

item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Jeff Miner of The Triumph Program about sports counseling and psychology. Also, Tim and Tom talk about Tom's attempted burglary, Girl Scout Cookie and Bourbon Pairing parties, and much more!

item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Stacey Saladin of Keller Williams Realty about some of the uniqe aspects of Kansas City's real estate market. Tim and Tom also talk about car wrecks, Ikea, social media political arguments, and how Apple employees need to pull their heads out of their apps!

item.title: Soccer Mom Scorn - Tim and Tom Episode 18
item.description: Tim and Tom have no guest this week, which leaves them more time to talk about the Winter Olympics, Valentine's Day, the newest 50 shades movies, award-winning coffee mugs, the Chiefs, the Royals, yelling at soccer moms, and SO MUCH MORE!

item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Casey Waugh, Communications Manager at Wayside Waifs about all the wonderful stuff they do for the local area, and local area animals. Also, Tim and Tom talk about the Super Bowl, Elon Musk's mannequin, going to WWE Smackdown and so much more

item.description: Jason Roske of KC Auction & Appraisal joins Tim and Tom to talk about the unique world of auctions, appraisals, and so much more. Also Tim and Tom talk about the State of the Union, the Super Bowl, and many more topics on this fun episode.

item.title: The Spanish Announce Table Episode 219 - The Royal Rumble
item.description: THIS PODCAST EPISODE IS INTENDED FOR ADULT LISTENERS. 18 YEARS AND OLDER. Captain Awesome and T-Mac have reemerged to bring you the much-anticipated Spanish Announce Table Royal Rumble Special! The fellas talk about Enzo Amore, Vince McMahon, The XFL, The Royal Rumble, Raw 25, and so much more.

item.title: RECAP - Tim and Tom Episode 15
item.description: Tim and Tom discuss home repairs, college basketball, the NFL Playoffs, the education system, The Post, and the Hawaii Missle Alert. They also play you a recap of some their interview highlights from the past.

item.title: The Roasterie - Tim and Tom Episode 14
item.description: Tim and Tom interview Danny O'Neill of The Roasterie about his amazing passion for coffee and how it helped him create a successful brand that is synonymous with Kansas City. Tim and Tom also talk about the Chiefs, Oprah 2020, The College Football National Championship Game, disgraced local politicians, and so much more in this fun episode.

item.title: Kyle Palmer KCUR -Tim and Tom Episode 13
item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Kyle Palmer of KCUR about all kinds of Kansas City news and about his job in morning radio and his podcast about Kansas City area school teachers. Also, Tim and Tom talk about New Year's Resolutions, old television reboots, and so much more in their first episode of 2018; the Year of the New Idea!

item.title: 2017: A Year of Transition - Tim and Tom Episode 12
item.description: Join Tim and Tom on a trip down memory lane as they discuss some of the biggest stories of 2017.

item.title: The National Wrasslin League - Tim and Tom Episode 11
item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Michael Strider of the National Wrasslin' League, Kansas City's newest and hottest professional wrestling organization that is taking over towns and TVs. They also talk about Christmas, Jehovah's Witnesses, holiday parties, a man named Stovepipe Stephens, hospital Santas, UFC fighters, Disney's purchase of Fox, job interviews, Blockbuster Video, Star Wars, Matty Matheson, Chris Farley, and a whole lot more.

item.title: Joel The Bandit - Tim and Tom Episode 10
item.description: Tim and Tom talk to local music connoisseur Joel The Bandit about the local Kansas City music scene, Up-Down's weekly local music event Local Tuesdays, and lots of other stuff. Tim and Tom also talk about Keaton the bullied kid with racist parents, Roy Moore, net nuetrality, mid-life crises, the Snow Bowl, Jake Tapper and more in this fun episode.

item.title: KC Sports Update with Ryan Witkowski - Tim and Tom Episode 9
item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Ryan Witkowski of 610 Sports to discuss some big picture stuff about the Chiefs and Royals. Tim even makes another bold prediction for the reaminder of the season. Tim and Tom also get serious and talk about the Supreme Court cake case and the controversial tax bill.

item.title: Anthony Sharkbait Gutierrez - Tim and Tom Episode 8
item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Anthony Sharkbait Gutierrez, local MMA fighter and professional wrestler, about his upcoming fight for the Kansas City Fighting Alliance, and his new career in professional wrestling for local company the National Wrasslin' Alliance. Tim and Tom also talk about what they did for Thanksgiving, one-year-olds drinking Sprite, running marathons, Post Malone, and prison podcasts. They also talk about how bad the Chiefs suck, and Tom gives you a movie review!

item.title: Atomic Fizz Soda Pop - Tim and Tom Episode 7
item.description: Tim and Tom interview Tanner Masters, President of Atomic Fizz Soda Pop about Kansas City's hottest new soda and their unique flavor. Learn about how a group of local teenagers used a group chat and entrepeneurial spirit to create something you've never tasted before! Also Tim and Tom talk about Thanksgiving, Friendsgiving, chainsaws, Bobcats, field burning, gravel driveways, Charlie Rose, Louis C.K., sexual assault scandals, Tom Hanks, Mount Rushmore, Kid Rock, Marcus Peters, Donald Trump, Marshawn Lynch and so much more in this fun episode!

item.title: The Spanish Announce Table episode 218 - Fireball
item.description: Tim and Tom love pro wrestling! So, for the four biggest WWE events each year they'll revive their former podcast: The Spanish Announce Table! This Sunday is WWE Survivor Series and Tim and Tom are pumped!

item.title: The Royal Chief - Tim and Tom Episode 6
item.description: Tim and Tom try to brush up on their knowledge of the local rap and hip hop scene by talking to The Royal Chief, a local rap artist, to talk about his career, his love of Kansas City, and so much more. Also, Tim and Tom talk about Twitter, Facebook asking for your nude photos, Kansas City detectives complaining of flatulence, and so much more in this fun episode.

item.title: Donutology - Tim and Tom Episode 5
item.description: Tim and Tom talk donuts with Andrew Cameron, owner and founder of Donutology. Learn about how a donut wound up in space, how a donut shop started selling thousands of t-shirts, why cops love donuts and so much more in this fun interview. Also, the guys talk about their weeks, the World Series, and many other fun topics

item.title: American Public Square - Tim and Tom Episode 4
item.description: Tim and Tom talk about some October staples; the World Series and Halloween! They also talk to Dr. Allan Katz about American Public Square, an organization dedicated to changing the tone and quality of public discourse through fact-based, cordial communication

item.title: KC Sports Update with Nick Jacobs - Tim and Tom Episode 3
item.description: Tim and Tom talk to Nick Jacobs of 41 Action News for an update on the Chiefs and The Royals. They also talk about Lamonte McIntyre being released from prison, Tom's shoulder surgery, Harvey Weinstein, and much more

item.title: The National WW1 Museum - Tim and Tom Episode 2
item.description: Tim and Tom have a super fun and informative interview with Lora Vogt, Curator of Education at the National WWI Museum and Memorial. They discuss the museum's history in Kansas City, how they cycle artifcacts and displays, the beautiful park surrounding the museum, WWI's impact on our culture today, and so much more. Tim and Tom also have some fun in the first segment talking about Chick-fil-A's ridiculous decision to open a store in an NFL Stadium, the Miami Dolphin's coach drug selfie, and how they realized this weekend they are getting old!

item.title: Up-Down Kansas City - Tim and Tom Episode 1
item.description: Tim and Tom finally return with a full episode! This week the guys discuss the tragedy in Las Vegas, the death of Tom Petty, and how amazing the Chiefs are playing. They also take a trip down to the Crossroads to talk to David Hayden, Marketing Manager of UpDown, a super cool arcade bar, to talk about it's origins and how it's become a part of the Kansas City nightlife!

item.title: Tim And Tom Episode 0
item.description: Tim and Tom are BACK! Sort of. They managed to find some time to tell you that they will manage to find some time in the near future to start bringing you exciting and fun interviews, discussions, podcasts, and videos; using Kansas City as their backdrop.

item.title: SAT 217 - Brian Shields Interview 2
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-mac invite Brian Shields on the show to talk about his new book: Second Nature: The Legacy of Ric Flair and The Rise of Charlotte, in addition to all the usual pro wrestling news, results, and rumors.

item.description: T-Mac has a hilarious dental condition, but that doesn't stop him from telling us all a great story. All that, and the usual news, results, and rumors in Episode 216!

item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome record this episode on the 7-year anniversary of the greatest match of all time. They celebrate by responding to some listener emails. They also have a hilarious interview with NWL Star Flex Zerba!

item.description: RoH standout Punishment Martinez stops by the table to talk about his life and career. Also, Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss all the latest news, results, and rumors in the world of professional wrestling.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac take another trip in the Spanish Announce Time Machine and go BACK IN TIME. They also make sure to spend plenty of time on current events by talking about the latest news, results, and rumors; including NXT TakeOver: Brooklyn III and SummerSlam!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac make their predictions for SummerSlam, and as always, they cover all the week's news, results, and rumors in the world of professional wrestling.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac navigate through a ho-hum week of wrestling, but they liven it up by interviewing a new friend of the show, The Founder, Owner, and CEO of the Leech Talent Agencies; Roscoe Leech!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss all the latest news, results, and rumors of the world of professional wrestling. In their third segment, the NWL KC Champion Dak Draper returns to the show for a segment called Road Stories, where the Mile High Magnum shares some humorous tales from his travels up and down the road.

item.description: The Spanish Announce Table turns 4 years old. Captain Awesome and T-Mac celebrate by doing what they always do, discussing the hottest topics in the world of professional wrestling. They even hop back in The Spanish Announce Time Machine and take a look back at some of their funniest moments.

item.title: SAT 208 - Peg Ya Later!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac cover the hosttest news, rumors, and results, of the professional wrestling week. They also make their predicitons for Battleground!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac cover the hottest news, results, and rumors of the world of professional wrestling. This week they talk a lot about Great Balls of Fire and even take a ride in the Spanish Announce Time Machine.

item.title: SAT 206 - A Preview of Balls
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-mac preview Great Balls of Fire and discuss all the other big news, results, and rumors in the world of professional wrestling.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-mac bring you 205 LIVE. If you missed the live feed, here's your chance to catch up on the whole show including, their special guest, The Most Hated Man in Mexico, Sam Adonis!

item.description: T-Mac tells us about how he got his face nearly bitten off by a dog, and he and Captain Awesome discuss all the hottest news, results, and rumors in the world of professional wrestling this week!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac have a fun time discussing everything that happened in wrestling this week, and even take some time to preview and make picks for Money in The Bank!

item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome bring you another fun interview in their third segment; this time with the brand-new NWL STL Champion Maverick, who talks about NWL, his wrestling career and training, and exactly why T-Mac's butt sweat makes him so mad. Before that, all the week's news, rumors, and results are discussed in their usual fun-loving fashion.

item.title: SAT 201 - Turn Signals
item.description: This week, T-Mac is stressed out with work, moving, and run-ins with the law! But, that doesn't stop him and Captain Awesome from covering the week's news and rumors, making their sure-fire picks for Extreme Rules, and letting the fans voice their opinions through Tweet The Table!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring The Spanish Announce Table for the 200th time! Portions of the show were recorded on-site at Up Down Kansas City for the NWL Nintendo 64 No Mercy Tournament and there are special cameos throughout the show from Marti Belle, Major Baisden, The Iceman, Michael Stider, Jeremy Wyatt, and Jack Foster!

item.title: SAT 199 - Good Job For Goldust
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are getting excited for the big Episode 200! They give you details on the special event they will be doing to celebrate, and even talk about all this week's news and rumors.

item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome manage to have a good time this show, even faced with a mediocre week of wrestling.

item.title: SAT 197 - I Lost My Hug
item.description: T-Mac is happy again as he and Captain Awesome return for another week of discussing the hottest news, rumors, and results of the professional wrestling week.

item.title: SAT 196 - Who Angry
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit down to talk about another week of wrestling and T-Mac even gets WHO angry!

item.title: SAT 195 - I, T-MAC
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac lead you through another week of professional wrestling; talking about all the biggest news, results, and rumors.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac interview Ron the Show Hughleuy of 610 Sports in Kansas City. Hughley, a long-time professional wrestling fan discusses WrestleMania and the economic impact it has on the host city. He then discusses why, and how, Kansas City should build a new stadium capable of hosting WrestleMania. Also, they break down the results, news, and rumors of this week of professional wrestling as well!

item.description: Coming off of WrestleMania week, Captain Awesome and T-Mac have a lot to talk about, including the most #TweetTheTable submissions in show history!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac cover the biggest news and rumors in the week of professional wrestling, including the Paige sex tape scandal.

item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome interview Jeff Ashworth, Editor in Chief of the new book The WWE Book of Rules (And How To Break Them), about the unique format of the book and his time working for WWE Magazine. They also break down the week of wrestling like only they can.

item.title: SAT 189 - Its A SWANN-tan
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome are back in their studio(s) for this episode and they review Fastlane, Raw, and Smackdown and many other pro wrestling topics of the week.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac apologize for the late show and the echo you will hear throughout. We did the show in a room at the Scottish Rite Temple before the latest National Wrasslin' League show. But lateness and echo will not degrade the level of entertainment you are used to from The Spanish Announce Table.

item.title: SAT 187 - Spaghetti, I'm Ready
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome discuss the week of wrestling, and the challenge to bait T-Mac out of battle rap retirement continues.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac interview Ryan Loco about his new project called the Two Way Dance Podcast, designed to help ECW stars with things like medical bills.

item.title: SAT 185 - A Podcast and a Fishing Pole
item.description: Captain Awesome an T-Mac discuss all the biggest news, results, and rumors in the world of professional wrestling.

item.title: Fight KC Special - 02.04.2017
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring you another Fight KC special highlighting some of the biggest and most shocking moments from the NWL KC show this past Saturday.

item.title: SAT 184 - Matt "Pierre Abernathy" Jackson Interview
item.description: This episode, Captain Awesome and T-Mac interview NWL STL's Matt Jackson, most recently known as Pierre Abernathy about his wrestling career and his new role in the National Wrasslin' League.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac call up Major Baisden, President of the National Wrasslin' League and interview him about some business aspects of starting a new wrestling company. They also make some Royal Rumble predictions and talk about a whole week's worth of wrestling topics.

item.title: Fight KC Special - 01.21.2017
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac attended the 2nd NWL KC show and got some great audio from some of their stars, including The Monarch Jeremy Wyatt, Thor Theriot, The Brand Chad Barstow, The Howletts, Roscoe Leech, and The Royal Blood. Don't miss some of these exciting interviews from the latest Fight KC!

item.title: SAT 182 - 12 DVDs For A Jumpstart
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac battle through more technical difficulties this week as T-Mac's headphones decided to stop working. But, that doesn't stop them from bringing you the best pro wrestling podcast in the BIZAHNESS!

item.title: SAT 181 - The Monarch Jeremy Wyatt and Travis Scott Bowden Interviews
item.description: This week the fellas bring their old friend of the show Jeremy Wyatt back on the show to talk about the latest turn in his professional wrestling career. They also play an interview from this past weekend with the Vice President of Marketing for the National Wrasslin' League Travis Bowden. They also talk about the biggest happening in the world of professional wreslting this week, so turn it up and tell your friends!

item.title: NWL Fight KC Special
item.description: Captain Awesome managed to get his hands on Media Pass for the inaugural NWL Fight KC event this past weekend in Kansas City. Captain managed to snag a bunch of interviews while there and plays them for you on this special episode!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac kick off the New Year by returning to their regular format and even bringing in St. Louis talk radio host and former wrestler Mark Bland on in the second hour(ish) to discuss wrestling and how much crossover pro wrestling has in real life, including politics.

item.title: SAT 179 - New Year's Resolutions 2016
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring your their annualy Year in Review episode discussing all the hot topics of 2016 and giving you their New Year's Resolutions for the impending 2017!

item.title: SAT 178 - DEAR SANTA 2016
item.description: Once again it that time of year again where we sit on Santa's lap and ask him for our Wrestling Christmas wishes!

item.title: SAT 177 - POWER HOUR
item.description: A slow week in wrestling brings you a shorter-than-normal episode of The Spanish Announce Table. Don't worry though; it's an hour full of exciting pro-wrestling discussion!

item.title: SAT 176 - What a Weekend!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac had some busy weekends and have lots of stuff to talk about, including WWE TLC.

item.title: SAT 175 - KATA RETURNS HOME
item.description: This week the fellas discuss what they did over Thanksgiving, in addition to the usual exciting pro wrestling dicsussion. They even welcome the return of Kataklyzmik to the emails!

item.title: SAT 174 - He's The Steve-O of Pro Wrestling
item.description: This week T-Mac and Captain Awesome discuss NXT Takeover: Toronto, Survivor Series, and everything else in between. They even take time to celebrate Thanksgiving by telling you what they are thankful for in wrestling.

item.title: SAT 173 - Survivor Series 2016 Picks
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss the latest news and rumors in professional wrestling, and they give their Survivor Series 2016 picks!

item.title: SAT 172 - NO POLITICS!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac pledge to bring you this week's episode without discussing POLITICS! Everyone clearly needs a break from all the anger and hatred that the United States Presedential Election has caused, and we feel like everyone should relax, and talk about pro wrestling for a little bit. So, that is precisely what we will do on this week's episode of The Spanish Announce Table!

item.title: Special Episode - NWL Exclusive Interviews
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac showed off their journalism degrees and secured some exclusive interviews with the newest talent signings for the National Wrasslin' League. They even managed to get an interview with League President Major Baisden. If you haven't heard of the NWL, you should listen as soon as you can to this special episode of the Spanish Announce Table!

item.title: SAT 171 - The World Series
item.description: This week T-Mac and Captain Awesome occasionally get distracted with an exciting Game 7 of the World Series. However, they don't let that get in the way of bringing you an exciting edition of the Spanish Announce Table!

item.title: SAT 170 - Cool Is The Spanish Announce Table
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac are starting to settle into the New Era and even figure out how to increase the audio quality midway through the show!

item.title: SAT 169 - The Corporation Followed Us!
item.description: This week, Captain Awesome had to take extra time editing the show because The Corporation followed us and tried to corrupt the files! Thankfully Captain Awesome is too smart for that and had an extra recording and was able to mix that down and present it here for YOU, as he and T-Mac bring you another successful week of The Spanish Announce Table!

item.title: SAT 168 - The New Era
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are a few weeks into the New Era of The Spanish Announce Table, and they are adapting well. This week they discuss their thoughts and the thoughts of the listeners on No Mercy, RAW, Smackdown Live, NXT, and much more!

item.title: SAT 167 - Dr. Tom Prichard Interview
item.description: This week T-Mac and Captain Awesome call up the legendary Dr. Tom Prichard to talk about his career and his upcoming appearance at KC Metro Pro for Tag Teamaggedon 2016! Dr. Tom gives the fellas an excellent interview that shouldn't be missed. So don't miss it!

item.title: SAT 166 - The Commish
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are starting to hit their stride while broadcasting from Parts Unknown. This week, they discuss some changes that need to happen and why they need to change. They still leave plenty of time for some great pro wrestling discussion, however, so get ready for another great week of The Spanish Announce Table!

item.title: SAT 165 - Papa Shango's Basement
item.description: The fellas are still on the run from the evil Corporation who is trying to silence the truth! Will they remain unscathed? How nasty is Papa Shango's basement? These answers and more on this week's episode of The Spanish Announce Table!

item.title: SAT 164 - The Corporation Can't Handle The Truth!
item.description: This week, please forgive us for the poor audio quality; but we are now on the run from the evil Corporation who are trying to silence the truth! This audio was taken from our Facebook Live video explaining the situation. If you would like, you can watch the video at Facebook.com/SpanishAnnounceTablePodcast

item.title: SAT 163 - Sasha Is Not Good!
item.description: This week T-Mac admits to Captain Awesome that he's not feeling the Women's Revolution. Will this spark outrage in our fans?

item.title: SAT 162 - WE'RE GONNA GET GBL FIRED!
item.description: This week T-Mac and Captain Awesome talk a LOT about Kevin Owens winning the Universal Championship; it's seemingly all the fans wanted to talk about! But of course they still make time to keep you up to speed with all the current events in this week of wrestling, and they contemplate whether or not to get GBL fired from his job.

item.title: SAT 161 - PARTY IN THE STUDIO
item.description: This week Captain Awesome bring in R8ted R as a special guest for a 3 hour PARTY of a show! They review SummerSlam and all the crazy happenings of this week of professional wrestling!

item.title: SAT 160 - You Don't Think He Could?
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome once again bring you some great discussions about the week of professional wrestling; giving extra special attention to whether or not Brock Lesnar can have his way with Randy Orton at SummerSlam!

item.title: SAT 159 - T-MAC KICKED A GIRL
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are back in the studio for another week of talking wrestling. T-Mac also talks about how he kicked a girl last weekend.

item.title: SAT 158 - Mom Doesn't Know How Facebook Live Works
item.description: This week Captain Awesome's Mom chimes in on some Facebook comments, and T-Mac thinks it's SUPER funny! Of course they also talk some wrestling!

item.title: SAT 157 - THREE YEAR ANNIVERSARY
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac celebrate their three year anniversary of talking wrestling with some old friends; local tag team The Riegel Twins and MMA Fighter Anthony "Sharkbait" Gutierrez.

item.title: SAT 156 - T-Macs Little Notes
item.description: Captain Awesome has returned from vacation and he and T-Mac breakdown everything from the draft to the upcoming Battleground special event. T-Mac even made NOTES!

item.title: SAT 155 - Special Episode
item.description: Captain Awesome has to leave town for a week so he and T-Mac have to do the show a day early. So, they bring you an exclusive interview featuring Jeremy Wyatt and Michael Strider in the same room at the same time, merely weeks before their big showdown at Metro Pro Wrestling. The four of them discuss the history of their current feud and previous storylines and even touch on some wrestling philosophy.

item.title: SAT 154 - LET'S BEAT UP JOHN CENA
item.description: This week Captain Awesome finds himself in rare waters with spare time on his hands and T-Mac has to snap him out of it. Also your esteemed hosts talk about their plans to beat up John Cena.

item.title: SAT 153 - We're Kinda Like Friends
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring you another great show this week! It's so great that Captain Awesome can't even remember what episode it is or even what time of year it is!

item.title: SAT 152 - WE LOVE CLEVELAND!
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac celebrate the return of their sound clips and they discuss their love for the great city of Cleveland!

item.title: SAT 151 - The Naked Show
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome invite Joe Kelly back into the studio and they all do the show NAKED!

item.title: SAT 150 - You Smell What I'm Shitting?
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac welcome The Iceman to sit in the studio for their 150th episode! The Iceman came in as the International Dance Champion, but did he LEAVE as the International Dance Champion?

item.title: SAT 149 - WOO BASKETBALL
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit back with a fine whiskey and discuss the world of professional wrestling, like they do every week.

item.title: SAT 148 - Amalgamation
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are starting to get back into the groove this week and they let loose on the world of professional wrestling.

item.title: SAT 147 - We Are Back
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring you the return of your regular format! Please try to contain your excitement while you listen.

item.title: SAT 146 - Funniest Moments Episodes 76-100
item.description: Captain Awesome is still too busy for the fans, so here's another clip show of the funniest moments of The Spanish Announce Table.

item.title: SAT 145 - Funniest Moments Episodes 55-75
item.description: Captain Awesome & T-Mac are off for two weeks because Captain Awesome has too much grown up stuff to do. So, they dusted off some tapes they found in the archives to bring you another episode of the Funniest Moments of The Spanish Announce Table.

item.title: SAT 144 - Bonus Point
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac invite the Official Artist of WWE Rob Schamberger into the studio to tell them about this year's WrestleMania festivities from behind the curtain. Rob also battles T-Mac to see who knows more about what happened On This Day in professional wrestling history.

item.title: SAT 143 - Athlete's Foot In The Butt
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome break down another week's worth of wrestling news, rumors, and results while giggling like school girls. Just another day in Podcastland.

item.title: SAT 142 - ITS LIKE A MUSCLE CONDOM
item.description: This week BOTH Captain Awesome and T-Mac are recording away from the studio. What horrible hilarity will become of this?

item.title: SAT 141 - Her Ovaries Look Like The Divas Title
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac try again, hopefully with better results, to bring you an acceptable level of audio quality as they try to navigate their new format while talking about WrestleMania, RAW, NXT Takeover: Dallas, the Hall of Fame, and so much more. They break down the news, play Tweet The Table, tell you what happened ON THIS DAY in professional wrestling history, and even answer some listener emails.

item.title: SAT 140 - A HOUSE DIVIDED
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome bring you the first episode of the show where they are not in the same room. As you will clearly hear, they still need to work out some bugs, but the screaming masses would never allow the show to not go off as planned, so this is what you get! They discuss a HUGE amount of news, make some WrestleMania picks, play a fun round of Tweet The Table, tell you what happened ON THIS DAY in professional wrestling, and even answer some listener emails!

item.title: SAT 139 - RYDER AND THE RYBACK
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome sit together in-studio for one of the final times before T-Mac begins to move about the country like a vagabond. But that doesn't stop them from bringing you the latest news and rumors from the world of professional wrestling, play a fun round of Tweet The Table, and answer some listener emails. They even take a break to sit down with Dustin Kaufman to talk about his latest endeavor; Pro Wrestling Nightly.

item.title: SAT 138 - THE FINAL EPISODE?
item.description: T-Mac announces that he has taken a new position that will take him out of Kansas City. He and Captain Awesome discuss what that means for the future of the show. They also break down the week's news and results, take a look back to what happened this week in wrestling history, answer listener emails, and play a fun round of Tweet The Table. They also talk about how T-Mac went on a date to a Trump rally.

item.title: SAT 137 - TOMMY TSUNAMI
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome debut their new R&B duo act that they're about to take on tour. They also discuss how T-Mac might have to take the Spanish Announce Table on the road thanks to his job. Captain surprises T-Mac with a new segment for the show, and T-Mac might be in love!

item.title: SAT 136 - TWO ABS T-MAC
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac hilariously analyze this week in professional wrestling by covering the latest news, answer listener emails, and play a fun round of Tweet The Table, while lamenting an impending Donald Trump presidency. They even squeeze in a quick discussion on what you might likely see happen, before you ever witness a Daniel Bryan Body Slam.

item.title: SAT 135 - Jake Whitco of WrestleThon Interview
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring you another great interview, this time hoping you'll help donate to a wonderful charity through the love of video games when they talk to the Founder and Host of WrestleThon, Jake Whitco. Jake talks about the upcoming WrestleThon 3 and he even answers our Cinco Preguntas, complete with a great storyline for him and T-Mac.

item.title: SAT 134 - TREVOR MURDOCH AND DEREK MCQUINN INTERVIEW
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit down with Trevor Murdoch and Derek McQuinn to talk about The Kansas City Pro Wrestling Training Center, the new wrestling school they are opening. They discuss training with Harley Race, road trips with Arn Anderson, marking out ringside in Japan, and being on the receiving end of a Doomsday Device; all while discussing what unique perspectives they can bring to a new wrestling student. Awesome and Mac also make their Fastlane picks, analyze the biggest news of the week, answer listener emails, and play another fun round of Tweet The Table.

item.title: SAT 133 - ROB SCHAMBERGER - HUNG LIKE A WHAT?
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring in an old friend to the studio; the official artist of WWE Rob Schamberger. Rob goes over his upcoming schedule and some cool new stuff you can buy, and even gives his opinions some of the current WWE and NXT storylines and news. They also give you a healthy dose of news, emails and Tweet The Table!

item.title: SAT 132 - HE WILL BE THE 6TH GUY IN A LADDER MATCH
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac talk about the Road to WrestleMania and all the news, results, and rumors from the week of wrestling. They also answer listener emails and play a fun round of Tweet The Table.

item.title: SAT 131 - It's Like A Warm Green Bay
item.description: This week T-Mac and Captain Awesome review Royal Rumble and see how they did in their Picks game. They also discuss the Rumble Fallout and some TNA and RoH. As always they give you all the news you can handle and they answer some listener emails and play a fun round of Tweet The Table!

item.title: SAT 130 - Kraig Kessaman Interview
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac interview local veteran wrestler Kraig Keesaman about his career and they also make some Royal Rumble Picks.

item.title: SAT 129 - It Looks Like An Elephant WIth Ear Infections
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss the impending Royal Rumble, the re-re-re-re-re-re-rebirth of TNA, the huge amount of injuries in WWE, and many more topics related to the week of professional wrestling.

item.title: SAT 128 - 2016 The Year of Pro Wrestling
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac return to their regular format and discuss the news, rumors, and results of the first week of 2016: The Year of Pro Wrestling.

item.title: SAT 127 - Year In Review 2015
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss the year that was wrestling in 2015 and give you their New Year's Resolutions!

item.title: SAT 126 - Dear Santa 2015
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit on Santa's knee this week and tell him what they wish for this wrestling Christmas.

item.title: SAT 125 - YOU HAVE TO PRO WRESTLE THIS
item.description: This week, Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss a week of wrestling that is seemingly filled with tons of potential, but will it pan out? Only time will tell. They also cover a bunch of news, answer some listener emails and run through a big round of Tweet The Table!

item.title: SAT 124 - WE'RE GONNA GET THROUGH THIS
item.description: A slow week of wrestling and continued studio issues try to strangle this show's positivity, but T-Mac and Captain Awesome won't let that happen! This week they keep looking for the silver linings and keep trying to stay positive and patient by talking about the week's news and rumors, making some picks for TLC, answering listener emails, and a running through a fun round of Tweet The Table!

item.title: SAT TEST - DID THEY FIX IT?!?!?!?!?!?!
item.description: On this quick 5-minute clip, Captain Awesome is just screwing around in the studio just to see if they indeed fixed the problems that were causing the technical difficulties that ruined Episode 122, so don't listen if you don't want to. It's just something to test the system. Or listen... why not? Hopefully it works and it will continue to do so when we bring you Episode 124 later this week!

item.title: SAT 123 - Captain Is The Cancer
item.description: This week the boys go studio-hopping trying to find one that will not force them to battle the dreaded TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES from the previous week. They finally settle down in something the looks more like a closet than a studio, but they manage to get the show recorded for your listening pleasure. You should express your gratitude in the form of PayPal donations to tableshow@gmail.com!

item.title: SAT 122 - NOT AGAIN!
item.description: UGH! The dreaded technical difficulties have shown back up and caused some audio glitches. Our lovely IT department decided to move CPUs around in the studios for some unknown reason and apparently we were lucky enough to get the one that likes to screw everything up. Segments start out fine and then get a little crispy. Hopefully it won't be too horrible and you can still enjoy this great episode of the show. Hopefully we can have this resolved next week.

item.title: SAT 121 - Ronda Rousey!
item.description: This week T-Mac and Captain Awesome talk a lot about MMA because Ronda Rousey actually lost! They also talk about the upcoming WWE Special Event Survivor Series, and make their picks for the matches. As usual, they also answer listener emails, tell you all the news you need to know and play a fun round of Tweet The Table.

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 31
item.description: @TableShow brought you the Spanish Announce Table. As the podcast grew, so did the number of responses to their Twitter hashtag, #TweetTheTable. While they tried to keep up with the response, the number of Tweets became too large. Captain Awesome and T-Mac were forced to leave some Tweets unread. The listeners became restless. A sponsor reached out. A supplemental podcast was born: #TweetTheTable--Rest of the Best. Do you have an opinion of--or a question about--or a critique of anything related to pro wrestling? Stick #TweetTheTable at the end of your Tweet, and these two guys are contractually obligated* to read your Tweet. There are a million different wrestling podcasts out there. This one reflects the views of the people in a fun and unique way, with a production quality that is second-to-none, especially in the realm of professional wrestling radio. *No contract was ever actually signed.

item.title: SAT 120 - Be A Dildo, Not A Dick!
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring you another episode of the greatest pro wrestling podcast your mother has ever heard. They run down the week's news and rumors, answer some listener emails, and play Tweet The Table!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 30
item.description: SmackDown recap! #TweetTheTable! We'll be here every morning to provide you with the latest news, rumors and results from the world of professional wrestling. That includes all things WWE (Raw, SmackDown, NXT, Tough Enough, Total Divas, the Network), TNA, GFW, ROH and the Indys. Live, Monday through Friday, beginning at 10 a.m. EST. Call us to share your take on things: 657-383-1786. You can also Tweet at us (@HEELZiggler_com) or find and join the live Periscope session! Co-hosts and featured guests will vary, especially early on, but you will always get a well-rounded take on all newsworthy items relevant to the IWC. The Audacity (@OTheAudacity) is probably going to be solo today. Follow us on Twitter (@HEELZiggler_com) for links to live broadcasts on BlogTalkRadio and Periscope.

item.title: SAT 119 - YEAH FOR PEOPLE!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are super proud of people this week, as they talk about the huge celebration and parade for the Kansas City Royals. They also, of course, talk about the week of professional wrestling, including the news and rumors. They also answer listener emails and play yet another fun round of Tweet The Table.

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 29

item.title: SAT 118 - GO ROYALS!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are distracted by Game Two of the World Series while they discuss Hell in a Cell and the rest of the week of wrestling. They lay down the news, answer some listener emails, and play a fun round of Tweet The Table!

item.title: SAT 117 - T-MAC LOVES EVERYTHING ABOUT HIS LIFE RIGHT NOW!
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac make their picks for Hell in a Cell and they answer listener emails and play a fun round of Tweet The Table!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 27
item.description: A one week break before the big COMEBACK episode! The video contains images of the hosts and some of the contributors. Like, woah. TweetTheTable Rest of the Best, Episode 27

item.title: SAT 116 - T-MAC HATES LOVE
item.description: This week T-Mac break down the week's news, rumors and results. They talk about how T-Mac hates everything, including LOVE, and they answer listener emails and play a fun round of TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 115 - Jim Cornette and Mark Sterling Interviews
item.description: This week the guys bring in professional wrestling managerial legend Jim Cornette to the show to pump up his upcoming Metro Pro Kansas City appearance, and he even answers Cinco Preguntas. They also interview The Fittest Wrestler on Earth Mark Sterling about his career and upcoming match at Metro Pro. They also answer some listener emails and play a fun round of TweetTheTable!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 26
item.description: The heralded Scott Steiner Intro version! And the first episode that has its own podcast and YouTube video all to itself! TweetTheTable Rest of the Best Episode 26

item.title: SAT 114 - FANDEADGUY
item.description: This week the guys run through a quick show and discuss the week's results, rumors and news. They also answer listener emails, play a fun round of Tweet The Table and unveil who the new Face of Fear is!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 25
item.description: Cramped into the end of this episode of Marking Out in the Middle you will find TweetTheTable Rest of the Best Episode 25

item.title: SAT 113 - CEREAL FOR DINNER
item.description: The guys breakdown Night of Champions and play a fun round of Tweet The Table, answer listener emails and talk about having cereal for dinner!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 24
item.description: If podcasts were hours we now have an entire day worth of this crap. TweetTheTable Rest of the Best Episode 24

item.title: SAT 112 - THE James Krause Interview
item.description: This week T-Mac battles UFC Fighter and owner of Glory MMA & Fitness THE James Krause in an ECW Trivia Battle, and they still talk about all the news and rumors of the week. They also answer listener emails, make some picks for Night of Champions, and play another fun round of TweetTheTable!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 23
item.description: Its 9/11 on TweetTheTable Rest of the Best. Never Forget. TweetTheTable Rest of the Best Episode 23

item.title: SAT 111 - Kurt Angle Is My Spirit Animal
item.description: This week the fellas discuss the impending demise of TNA, Kurt Angle taking a break, Brock Lesnar taking on The Big Show, Total Divas getting thrown out of a bar, Foot Face getting married and so much more! They also answer listener emails and play a fun round of Tweet The Table!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 22
item.description: Theres nothing exciting after you turn 21. unless you are an awesome podcast that just happens to be turning 22.

item.title: SAT 110 - Why Are You Having Sex With A Nazi?
item.description: This week the fellas discuss the crazy week of wrestling news including Hulk Hogan's tearful apology, Jimmy Snuka and Bram's arrests, TNA's impending death, and so much more. They also talk about the week of wrestling, answer listener emails, and play a fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 21
item.description: If episodes were years you could legally buy this one a drink. Apparently someone did.

item.description: One and one-fourth of a dozen episodes. You do the math. TweetTheTable The Rest of the Best Episode 15.

item.title: SAT 103 - We Are Tired

item.description: Its the dozenth episode! You can't stop it! TweetTheTable The Rest of the Best Episode 12.

item.description: The long-awaited 100th episode has arrived! The World Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts interview WWE Hall of Famer Mick Foley, interact and reminisce with the fans of the greatest wrestling podcast of all the times, and talk about WWE, TNA, RoH, GFW, Lucha Underground, Seth Rollins, Brock Lesnar, Paul Heyman, Kane, The Authority, Johnny Mundo, Bray Wyatt, Prince Puma, Roman Reigns, Kurt Angle, EC3, The Big Show, James Storm, Ryback, The Miz, Dolph Ziggler, and more! item.description: Could this be better than the Canadian version? Quite possibly! TweetTheTable The Rest of the Best Episode 11.

They talk about Money In The Bank, Seth Rollins, Dean Ambrose, John Cena, Kevin Owens power-bombing Machine Gun Kelly, Roman Reigns, Bray Wyatt, The Prime Time Players winning their first WWE Tag Team Championships, Ryback, Sheamus, Triple H, Brock Lesnar returning, and the unfortunate death of The American Dream Dusty Rhodes. They even get a surprise appearance and interview from The Official Artist of WWE, Rob Schamberger!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Rest of the Best - Episode 10
item.description: You never know what will be discussed but you know it will start with some high energy theme music! TweetTheTable The Rest of the Best Episode 10.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss the week of pro-wrestling. They breakdown all the news of WWE, TNA, GFW and more, they answer listener emails, and play a fun round of #TweetTheTable! kych64t7

item.description: With Mother's Day right around the corner, Captain Awesome and T-Mac invite friend of the show, the official artist of WWE Rob Schamberger into the studio. item.description: The dreaded Cumulus Curse of Technical Difficulties is back and it cuts the show down to under an hour this week but T-Mac and Captain Awesome still manage to pack it full of POSITIVITY AND PATIENCE!

item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome plead with WWE to simply let us have fun. They also answer some listener emails, play a fun round of Tweet The Table, and make their picks for Extreme Rules.

item.description: In the second episode of Tweet The Table - Best of the Rest The Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts discuss the week of professional wrestling while hoping T-Mac doesn't die during the broadcast!

item.description: This week the fellas are concerned with T Mac's health as they discuss the week's news, answer some listener emails, and play another great round of #TweetTheTable. They also spared some time to continue putting up a fight in the epic Tuesday Night Wars!

item.title: Tweet The Table - The Best of the Rest - Episode 1
item.description: If you're a fan of the Spanish Announce Table podcast, then you're familiar with their hashtag: #TweetTheTable. This is for the Tweets that didn't quite make the original podcast, but still deserves to be acknowledged. Available exclusively at HEELZiggler.com and BlogTalkRadio.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss the first week after WrestleMania, answer listener emails, play #TweetTheTable, delivers some BIG NEWS about Tweet The Table, and still manage to start a war!

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss WrestleMania, discover who won this year of PPV Picks, are humbled by the amazing amount of #TweetTheTable contributions and answer some listener emails. Also the World Tag Team Champions of Wrestling Podcasts invite the World's Finest Tag Team, Rob and Katy Schamberger, into the studio to discuss their amazing adventure at this years WrestleMania and WrestleMania Axxess.

item.description: Professional Wrestler Jeremy Wyatt and the infamous Rated R are live in the studio for the annual pre-wrestlemania show where Captain Awesome, T-Mac, and their guest break down this year's card.

item.description: The best pro wrestling talk show hosts ever discuss this week in wrestling, they announce a new contest giveaway, and T-Mac even promises a gift to the listeners if #TweetTheTable becomes a worldwide trending topic during WrestleMania!

item.title: SAT 85 - I Do A Podcast
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown the week of wrestling the only way they know how, by drinking beer and getting crazy! Plus they even devise a fool-proof plan for T-Mac to score a hot date!

item.title: SAT 84 - Dustin Kaufman Interview
item.description: This week the fellas bring local comedian Dustin Kaufman in to discuss comedy and performance art and how it relates to wrestling. Also they discuss the week's news, answer some listener emails, and play a fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 83 - Yet Another Lawsuit
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac review WWE Fastlane and cover the week's news, answer listener emails and play another fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 82 - There's A Tick On My Dick
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac do a live on-location interview with Rob Schamberger at the famous Schamberger Labs and Rob brings a surprise guest with him. Also, as usual the fellas break down the week of wrestling, all the news, answer your emails and play a fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 81 - We Rule
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss the week of wrestling to include Rikishi's induction into the WWE Hall of Fame and the recent releasing of nude Seth Rollins photos. Also they answer listener emails and play a fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.description: T-Mac and the Captain discuss Triple H's appearance on the Stonecold Podcast as well as the latest happenings in wrestling this week. Also they answer listener emails and play a fun round of #TweetTheTable.

item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac welcome in wrestling columnist and magazine editor Justin Kendall into the studio to talk some wrasslin'. They also go over how they did in their Royal Rumble Picks, answer some listener emails, talk about the news and play a great round of #TweetTheTable!
