item.description: T-Mac isn't feeling well and Captain Awesome keeps downing the hard cider as they make their Royal Rumble Picks, breakdown the week's news, answer listener emails and play another fun round of #TweetTheTable. Also, they hope they finally settled the "Emails First Conspiracy".

item.title: SAT 77 - Just Stay Patient
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac start off not being so positive and patient but they right the ship by the end of the show after breaking down the week's news, answering listener emails and playing another fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 76 - This Is Not A Cooking Show
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome are back for the first show of the new year by kicking it old school and bringing you the news, listener emails and #TweetThe Table. They also breakdown WrestleKingdom 9 and run the first edition of T-Mac's 3-Ps.

item.title: SAT 75 New Years Resolutions 2014
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit down for the last time in 2014 to bring you the Year in Review, The 2014 Table Awards, and their New Years Resolutions.

item.title: SAT 74 - Dear Santa 2014
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac ask Santa for some wrestling Christmas gifts, answer the final listener emails of 2014 and play a fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 73 - BATTLE RAPS
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are back this week with minimal technical difficulties. They cover a LOT of news, reveal who won the TLC round of PPV Picks, answer listener emails, and reveal the winner of Wrassle Roos Presents: #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 72 - YOU'RE The Shits!
item.description: This week the dreaded Technical Difficulties were back with a vengeance, even so much as to force Captain Awesome and T-Mac to re-record two segments of the show on a later date. But the Tag Team Champions of Wrestling Podcasts muscled through it and present you with a MEGA show featuring Kansas City's own Wrestling Painter Extraordinaire Rob Schamberger who discusses the newest WWE DVD: True Giants, which features him and his paintings. Also, they call up Jonathan Bowles, the owner and creator of Wrassle Roos, to talk to him about his product that is the latest rage in the wrestling world. They also cover the latest news, make some picks for TLC... and S, answer some listener emails and play another fun round of #TweetTheTable.

item.title: SAT 71 - Technical Difficulties
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac get displaced to a different studio and all is going great until the last segment when they experience the dreaded Blue Screen of Death. But they manage to discuss the CM Punk and Vince McMahon podcast interviews, interview former WWE writer and current owner of Metro Pro Wrestling Chris Gough, answer listener emails and play another awesome round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 70 - Brian Shields Interview
item.description: This week the fellas interview Brian Shields, the amazing author of 30 Years of WrestleMania. Brian talks with Captain Awesome and T-Mac for an hour about the book, his life as a wrestling fan, and even answers questions from listeners. They also determine who won this round of PPV Picks as they discuss WWE Survivor Series, and as always they answer listener emails and play another fun round of #TweetTheTable.

item.title: SAT 69 - Family Friendly
item.description: The Tag Team Champions of Wrestling Podcasts bring you yet another family friendly episode of wrestling talk. They make their picks for Survivor Series, cover the latest wrestling news, answer listener emails and, of course, play another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 68 - CONSPIRACY
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit down for another week of rasslin-podcast mastery as they discuss the week's news, answer listener emails and play an exciting and fun round of #TweetTheTable. Also, they address the "truthers" conspiracy theories.

item.title: SAT 67 - WHERE THEY AT DOE?
item.description: After several weeks of long shows the Tag Team Champions of Rasslin' Podcasts keep this episode short and talk about the week's latest news, answer listener emails, play another exciting round of #TweetTheTable and try to answer the important question: WHERE THEY AT DOE?

item.title: SAT 66 - BLU KA ZOO
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac go over Hell In A Cell and find out which one of them won this round of PPV Picks, they cover the news, answer listener emails, play another round of #TweetTheTable, and try to nail down exactly how to say Blukazoo's name right once and for all.

item.title: SAT 65 - MEDICAID
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac make their Hell In A Cell Picks, talk about RAW in Kansas City, and discuss the subtle flavor nuances of Natural Ice beer. As always, they also deliver the news, answer listener emails and play the funnest game around #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 64 - Episode Nintendo 64
item.description: On episode Nintendo 64 Captain Awesome and T-Mac go on some epic TNA rants and discuss how cool it would be if Dean Ambrose would hang out with T-Mac. Also, as usual they cram in some news, listener emails and #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 63 - Whiteus Oneil
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac kick out a short but sweet episode of the tried and true segments of NEWS, E-MAILS, and #TWEETTHETABLE! They even grace you with a couple of movie picks!

item.title: SAT 62 - Magic Man Interview
item.description: Buckle up for one of the most entertaining interviews Captain Awesome and T-Mac have ever conducted with wrestling personality Magic Man. The boys also talk to friend of the show Travis "T-Money" Conley about his newest venture to help prove how bad-ass America is. Of course, as always, news is covered, emails are answered, and another round of #TweetTheTable is played!

item.title: SAT ROAD STORIES 1 - There's A F'n Chicken
item.description: In the first episode of our special new series ROAD STORIES, Captain Awesome and T-Mac bring amazing wrestling artist Rob Schamberger and professional wrestler and International Dance Champion The Iceman into the studio to have a few beers and donuts and tell us a few stories about life on the wrestling road.

item.title: SAT 61 - Jaysin Strife Interview
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac call up another great interview, this time with professional wrestler and owner of Magnum Pro Wrestling: Jaysin Strife. Jaysin entertains the boys with tales of starting a pro wrestling promotion, traveling the world, wrestling some great household names, and even drops some dirt. Also, the Tag Team Champions of Wrestling Podcasts reveal who won the Night of Champions round of PPV Picks, give you a good dose of news, answer some listener emails and play another great round of #TweetTheTable.

item.title: SAT 60 - Miss Natural Interview
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac have their first female guest on the show when they call Miss Natural and talk to her about her career and family lineage. Miss Natural even gives them a couple of good Harley Race stories. Also the Tag Team Champions of Wrestling Podcasts make their picks for Night of Champions, talk about the latest news, answer listener emails and play another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 59 - Season Premiere
item.description: On the SEASON PREMIERE of the Spanish Announce Table, your amazing hosts Captain Awesome and T-Mac dish out another hilarious week of wrestling news and opinions, play another round of the world-famous #TweetTheTable, answer listener emails, and even create the next big charity challenge!

item.title: SAT 58 - Slater Gator
item.description: This week Capatin Awesome and T-Mac talk about wrestling! What did you think was gonna happen? As usual they talk about the news, do another hour-long segment of #TweetTheTable and answer listener emails.

item.title: SAT 57 - Help The Homeless
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac were easily distracted as they stopped their jam-packed wrestling content many times to talk about things like dogs and homeless people. But they still deliver great and funny wrestling content with news, emails and #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 56 - ALBERTO DEL REY-CISM
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown SummerSlam and reveal who won their PPV Picks. Also, as always they give you the news, answer your emails, and play another round of #TweetTheTable. They even find time to go on a huge rant about racism! Check out our website for blogs and wrestling recaps! www.spanishannouncetable.net

item.title: SAT 55 - We're BACK!
item.description: The Spanish Announce Table has returned to the studio after their two week break! The famous painter Rob Schamberger stops by the studio to talk about his recent trip to the Dan Gables Pro Wrestling Hall of Fame and his upcoming trip to L.A. For WWE SummerSlam, Captain Awesome and T-Mac make their SummerSlam picks, and as always, they answer listener emails and play another round of #TweetTheTable.

item.title: SAT 54 - Funniest Moments of The Spanish Announce Table - Part 2
item.description: This episode is a special clip show of some of our funniest moments from our first year. In Part 2 we bring you the funniest moments of episodes 27-52. Remember to #TweetTheTable to let us know what you think! Thanks for listening!

item.title: SAT 53 - Funniest Moments of The Spanish Announce Table - Part 1
item.description: This episode is a special clip show of some of our funniest moments from our first year. In Part 1 we bring you the funniest moments of episodes 1-26. Remember to #TweetTheTable to let us know what you think! Thanks for listening!

item.title: SAT 52 - One Year Anniversary
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac celebrate their one year anniversary by catching up with The Iceman to see how his latest event went, covering the news, reviewing who won their Battleground Picks, playing another fun round of #TweetTheTable, and play some audio clips sent in by listeners!

item.title: SAT 51 - Kill Linda
item.description: This episode is packed full of energy! Captain Awesome and T-Mac make their Battleground picks, cover the news, play another exciting round of #TweetTheTable, answer listener emails, and T-Mac has a STINGASUM!

item.title: SAT 50 - Dan The Cannon Interview
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac finally interview the Man, the Myth, the Legend, Dan The Cannon and talk about the AWWiR Community, as well as breakdown the news and results of the week of wrestling like no one else can! As usual, they also answer listener emails and play another exciting round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 49 - Jason Rivera Interview
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac interview the newest columnist for SpanishAnnounceTable.net: Jason Rivera. Jason shares his stories of becoming a wrestling fan and writing wrestling articles and recaps for the last two decades. Of course they also have Jason answer Cinco Preguntas! Also, the fellas breakdown Money In The Bank and reveal who won the latest rounds of PPV Picks! As usual, they also answer listener emails and play another exciting round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 48 - Iceman Interview.
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac interview a 14-year veteran of the wrestling industry; The International Dance Champion, The Iceman! They discuss his career and talk about the show he's putting on in July for a great cause! Also, the boys make their Money In The Bank picks and T-Mac attempts to validate the legitimacy of his Fun Facts. As usual, they also answer listener emails and play another fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 47 - P.S.
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown TNA's Slammiversary and see who won this round of PPV Picks. They also cover WWE, bring you up-to-date on the news and Captain Awesome tells a story about what his name almost was! They also answer listener emails and do another fun round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 46 - Slammiversary Picks
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome convene once again to discuss the past week of professional wrestling. They also look to the future and play another round of Pay Per View Picks where they each try to predict the match outcomes of TNA's Slammiversary! They also answer listener emails and play another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 45 - Hey IDIOTS!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss the results of Payback and Raw, and they even talk about high school reunions. Also, as usual, the Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts break down the week of professional wrestling in a way like no one else can. They also answer listener emails and play another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 44 - Rob Schamberger Interview
item.description: Rob Schamberger and his wife Katy stop by for another awesome interview, T-Mac and Captain Awesome play Pay-Per-View Picks for Payback, and as usual, the Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts break down the week of professional wrestling in a way like no one else can. They also answer listener emails and play another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 43 - Hype Gotti Interview
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac get professional wrestler Hype Gotti on the phone to discuss his career and his thoughts on the current state of the wrestling business. Also, they get him to answer Cinco Preguntas! Also, as usual, the Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts break down the week of professional wrestling in a way like no one else can. They also answer listener emails and play another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 42 - The T-Mac Apology Tour.
item.description: This week T-Mac has a few apologies and Captain Awesome's dreams are crushed. As usual the Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts break down the week of professional wrestling in a way like no one else can. They also answer listener emails and play another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 41 - Southerners; I'm Sorry.
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac review Extreme Rules and find out who won the latest round of PPV Picks. They also breakdown the news, results and rumors of the past week of wrestling, answer some listener emails and do another hilarious round of #TweetTheTable.

item.title: SAT40 - Dean Ambrose and Seth Rollins Interview
item.description: Dean Ambrose and Seth Rollins of The Shield stop by the studio and answer Cinco Preguntas. T-Mac and Captain Awesome review who won the Sacrifice Picks and they also attempt to predict the outcomes of Extreme Rules! They also talk about their experience attending SmackDown live and as usual, they answer emails and go another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 39 - Sacrifice Picks!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac return to their normal format after several weeks of guests and interviews. They breakdown WWE, NXT, and TNA and they each predict the outcomes of Sacrifice to kick off a fresh new season of PPV Picks! Also, as always, they give you some news, answer emails and do a round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 38 - Travis Conley Interview
item.description: Your Tag Team Champions of Wrestling Podcasts bring you another amazing interview, this time with former professional wrestler and student of the great Harley Race: Travis Conley a.k.a T-Money! Travis shares stories of his training with Harley Race and his wrestling career. He also tells the story of wrestling a match with Mick Foley as the Special Referee and, as always, he couldn't leave the studio without answering CINCO PREGUNTAS! Your distinguished hosts also give you a thorough breakdown of WWE, NXT, and TNA. They cover a week's worth of wrestling news and of course, they save time to answer listener emails and do another round of #TweetTheTable!

item.title: SAT 37 - Rob Schamberger Post-WrestleMania Axxess Interview
item.description: The fellas bring in famous wrestling painter Rob Schamberger for his first interview following his exciting work at WrestleMania Axxess. They also discuss his painting of the jacket Ultimate Warrior wore during the following Raw. Captain Awesome and T-Mac also learn of the sad news of the Ultimate Warrior's passing midway through the show. Also, they breakdown the news as usual, answer some emails and do Tweet The Table!

item.title: SAT 36 - WrestleMania Special
item.description: Your Tag Team Champions of wrestling podcasts go off-format this week to bring you their WrestleMania Special. They invite an active professional wrestler Jeremy Wyatt and professional MMA fighter and wrestling fan Anthony "Sharkbait" Gutierrez into the studio to help balance the "smarky" jaded older-fan views of T-Mac and Captain Awesome.

item.title: SAT 35 - Let's Do THIS!!!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac do THIS for the 35th time. As usual they breakdown WWE, TNA, and NXT and they answer emails and do a super-long run of #TweetTheTable.

item.title: SAT 34 - HELL YEAH
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown the week's news, results and rumors, and T-Mac even floods the show with some unbelievable facts!

item.title: SAT 33 - SPECIAL GUEST INTERVIEW!!!
item.description: T-Mac surprised Captain Awesome with a big interview during the show with the one of the most talked about wrestlers of the week. Also, they discover who won the latest round of PPV picks when they review TNA Lockdown.

item.title: SAT 32 - LOCKDOWN PICKS
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss Chicago Raw, NXT Arrival, TNA and do their latest round of their PPV Picks game for TNA Lockdown.

item.title: SAT 31 - GREEN BAY SUCKS!!!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss Elimination Chamber and reveal who won the latest round of Pay-Per-View Picks. They cover the news and results as usual and they even sit down with wrestling artist Rob Schamberger!

item.title: SAT 30 - Elimination Chamber Results
item.description: T-Mac and Captain Awesome celebrate their 30th episode by... doing exactly what they always do, breaking down the week of wrestling like no one else can! This week they also play another round of their PPV Picks game for the upcoming WWE Elimination Chamber and they also discuss the unfortunate passing of Nelson Frazier, Jr, best known as Big Daddy V/Viscera/Mabel.

item.title: SAT 29 - Life is Good!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac are back to discuss the week of professional wrestling, but not before telling you how great their lives are right now. They also run through another packed round of #TweetTheTable and answer some listener emails!

item.title: SAT 28 - BIG E LANGSTON and JOE MCDONALD Interviews
item.description: In possibly the longest show to date, Captain Awesome and T-Mac manage to track down WWE Intercontinental Champion Big E Langston to ask him Cinco Preguntas AND they invite former pro-wrestler/promoter/owner of Central States Wrestling Joe McDonald into the studio to talk about his career. And as always, WWE and TNA get broken down, another round of #TweetTheTable and listener emails round-out the show!

item.title: SAT 27 - ENERGY!!!
item.description: In a nearly 3 hour juggernaut of a show, Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown Royal Rumble and how they did on their picks. They talk Raw and TNA Genesis. They also answer listener emails and run through another exciting round of #TweetTheTable. They also introduce a brand new segment called NO HOLDS BARRED!

item.title: SAT 26 - Will The Real Spanish Announce Table Please Stand Up?
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown the news, rumors, and results of the week of wrestling. They also give you their Royal Rumble Picks and T-Mac 2:16 promises to extend his lead over Captain Awesome. They also treat you to another round of Tweet The Table and they answer listener emails. To top it off, they each have their own angry rant to end the show!

item.title: SAT 25 - Joe Kelly Interview
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit down with veteran fight promoter, President/Founder of Titan Fighting Championship Joe Kelly to get some insights into the business side of the new WWE Network. Joe also chimes in on the news, answers Cinco Preguntas, and even brings a special guest with him to help with a long-awaited special segment.

item.title: SAT 24 - Let's Podcast!
item.description: The Tag Team Champions of Wrestling Podcasts are back for their first episode of 2014! Even though T-Mac was sick, he and Captain Awesome still managed to masterfully breakdown the week's news, rumors and results AND they even sit down with the great Kansas City-based artist Rob Schamberger to talk about his latest great deals!

item.title: SAT 23 - New Year's Resolution
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac dish out their end of the year awards! They also tell you what their New Years Wrestling Resolutions are.

item.title: SAT 22 - Dear Santa
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac ask Santa nicely for their Christmas wishes.

item.title: SAT 21 - Katie I'm Sorry
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit down this week and review WWE TLC and how they did on their PPV Picks. They breakdown Raw and Impact and they even discuss John Cena the womanizing janitor! PLUS, a bonus NINTH SEGMENT where they celebrate turning 21 by getting drunk and watching a terrible pro wrestling pay-per-view!

item.title: SAT 20 - T-Mac's Mom!
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss how awesome the final segment on Raw was and they make their TLC picks and do some trash talking while doing so. Of course, as always they drop some news and rumors and they answer a TON of emails!

item.title: SAT 19
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac discuss all the news, rumors and results of the week of wrestling and come to the conclusion that it pretty much sucked this week! Also they answer emails, make some predictions, and talk about the new website.

item.title: SAT 18
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown the results of Survivor Series and see how they did on their picks. Then they go over everything that happened on Raw and Impact and answer 4 emails!

item.title: SAT 17
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac invite Kansas City Wrestling Star Jeremy Wyatt into the studio. Jeremy tells a bunch of stories about how he was trained by a snake charmer and shares some great stories about Ring Rats and Juggalo Championship Wrestling! Also, your World Tag Team Champions of the World break down all the results of Raw, Smackdown, and Impact, AND they run through another round of PPV Picks and tell you exactly how THEY see Survivor Series playing out.

item.title: SAT 16
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac sit down with Rob Schamberger, an amazing artist whose goal is to paint ALL of wrestling's World Champions. Rob has been featured in various news publications including WWE.com and has met hundreds of wrestlers and other people in the wrestling business. Please check out Rob's work at www.robschamberger.com Captain and T-Mac discuss Rob's journey and listen to some of his stories and, of course, they make him answer CINCO PREGUNTAS! Also, as usual, your World Tag Team Champion of the World breakdown all the results, news, and rumors of the world of wrestling like only they can!

item.title: SAT 15 - Roll Up! HEEEEEEYYYYY!
item.description: Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown the wrestling week like only they can. This week they discuss T-Mac's horrible kidney stones and how much he hates John Cena trying to end cancer! They also answer 3 emails and argue over whether on not AJ Styles sucks!

item.title: SAT 14 - Chris Gough Interview
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac interview former WWE Creative member and current owner of Metro Pro Wrestling Chris Gough! They also break down Hell in a Cell, review their picks, and discuss how much they like Raw and Impact and they give you all the wrestling news you need!

item.title: SAT 13 - ASSMAN
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac breakdown Bound For Glory and see who won this round of PPV Picks. They also make their next picks for Hell In A Cell! And as usual, they breakdown everything that happened on Raw, Smackdown, and Impact and even answer a couple of emails!

item.title: SAT 12 - FO DAT ASS! - Dolph Ziggler and Martin Thomas Interviews
item.description: This week, T-Mac and Captain Awesome sit down with professional wrestling referee Martin Thomas AND they also interview The Show Off Dolph Ziggler! This jam-packed episode is officially "cant-miss"! Of course, we make both of them answer CINCO PREGUNTAS!

item.title: SAT 11
item.description: This week, your Tag Team Champions discuss how badly T-Mac DESTROYED Captain Awesome in their BattleGround picks and they discuss adding a new segment to the show.

item.title: SAT 10 - T-Mac's Birthday Edition!
item.description: This week, we celebrate T-Mac's birthday with his BIRTHDAY BARRAGE and we play another round of Pay Per View Picks! We also breakdown all that happened on Raw, Smackdown and Impact; plus, we keep you up-to-date on all the wrestling news you can handle!

item.title: SAT 9 - Our First Interview!
item.description: This week Captain Awesome and T-Mac invite Kansas City wrestling legend Justin Appleberry to discuss his years of wrestling under the name Michael Strider. They also breakdown Night of Champions and find out who won this round of picks as well as discuss the wrestling week as usual!

item.title: SAT 8 - Toronto DOES NOT Suck!
item.description: This week we discuss how great the Toronto crowd was for Raw, we discuss the WWE Performance Center, and we go head to head once again with our picks for Night of Champions! Your brain is about to be SLAMMED through a table of wrestling knowledge as T-Mac and Captain Awesome BREAKDOWN the week's news and rumors. They also systematically review the entire week of wrestling results and let you know exactly what you should think about it! Don't like it? TOO BAD!
